name: Aspect Fit and 3D Object Rotate 魔法自适应与3D旋转
description:
1.魔法自适应可任意伸缩图片、图形、图表不会超出画板且自适应画板大小不变形，非常适合驾驶舱、卡片化设计等领域。

2.3D旋转，可以3D旋转任何图形、图片及插画。非常适合制作作品集展示、插画设计等。

3.感谢灵感和研究来源的各位大神，小老虎和草帽等。


1. Magic adaptive arbitrary telescopic pictures, graphics, charts can not exceed the size of the drawing board and adaptive drawing board, very suitable for Dashboard, card design and illustrations

fields.


2.3D rotation: any graphics, pictures and illustrations can be rotated in 3D. Ideal for portfolio presentation, illustration design, etc.


3. Thank you for your inspiration and research sources, such as 小老虎 and 草帽.
